text: Larnaca is a city on the southern coast of Cyprus. It is the capital of the Larnaca District. Larnaca is home to the country's primary airport, Larnaca International Airport. It also has a seaport and a marina. ==Notable residents== * Zeno of Citium (c. 334 – c. 262 BC), Stoic philosopher * Apollonios of Kition (1st century BC), physician, nicknamed "the Cypriot Hippocrates" * Ebubekir Pasha (1670 – 1757/1758), Governor of Larnaca and philanthropist * Giorgos Theofanous, composer ==References== Category:Cities in Cyprus Category:Republic of Cyprus
title: Larnaca
